document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2002-02
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING BY REFERENCE NAPA COUNTY ORDINANCE 6.16 REGULATING VICIOUS AND NUISANCE ANIMALS AND ADOPTING A NEW MUNICIPAL CODE CHAPTER 8.06 REGULATING BARKING DOGS
